sections.heading: 3-401 through 3-429 of the Mental Health Law shall be known and may be cited as the "Oklahoma Alcohol and Drug Abuse Services Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 1978, c. 64, ยง 1. Amended by Laws 1983, c. 134, ยง 1, eff. July 1, 1983; Laws 1986, c. 103, ยง 36, eff. Nov. 1, 1986. Renumbered from ยง 2100 of Title 63 by L
